thread.section_title: Chewy.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Chewy.com | chewy.com
thread.title: Chris

author: Chris
title: Chris
text: I have ordered from other Pet sites and decided to try Chewy. I will not use anyone else. I was so impressed with their packaging. I order for my cat and feral cats and the packages of wet food comes very secure in great shipping packaging. The pack the box with enough shipping paper that things don't flop around and come damaged. The prices are by far the best I have seen. My orders have always arrived within 2 days!! Definitely love Chewy! Keep up the good work.
